source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW zendesk_role
    AS

SELECT
    ticket_id,
    name,
    email,
    role
FROM odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_submitter 
UNION
SELECT
    ticket_id,
    name,
    email,
    role
FROM odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_assignee
UNION 
SELECT
    ticket_id,
    name,
    email,
    role
FROM odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_collaborator
UNION 
SELECT
    ticket_id,
    name,
    email,
    role
FROM odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_requester
order by ticket_id

%%sql
SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_custom_fields_id_value t1 FULL JOIN zendesk_role t2 ON t1.ticket_id = t2.ticket_id

%%sql
-- Build comment_type_reference_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
        THEN T1.ServiceDataID
        ELSE NULL
    END AS ServiceDataID, -- surrogate key
    T1.TicketID,
    T3.case_number as CaseReference,
    T3.salutation AS Salutation,
    T3.firstname AS FirstName,
    T3.lastname AS LastName,
    T3.address1 AS AddressLine1,
    T3.address2 AS AddressLine2,
    T3.city AS AddressTown,
    T3.county AS AddressCounty,
    T3.postcode AS Postcode,
    T3.country AS AddressCountry,
    T3.organisationname AS Organisation,
    T3.organisationtypename AS OrganisationType,
    T3.typeofinvolvement AS Role,
    T3.telephoneoffice AS TelephoneNumber,
    T3.telephonemobile AS OtherPhoneNumber,
    T3.fax AS FaxNumber,
    T3.email AS EmailAddress,
    -- T3.WebAddress,
    -- T3.ServiceUserType,


    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID, -- NOT CORRECT
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) AS RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number = T1.ServiceDataID 
        AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) <> T1.RowID
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData,
    T1.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_standardised_db.horizon_service_user T3 ON T3.case_number = T3.case_number and T1.IsActive = 'Y'



WHERE
    (-- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.case_number = T1.ServiceDataID 
            AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T3.case_number,'.'), IFNULL(T3.firstname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.lastname,'.'), IFNULL(T3.email,'.'), IFNULL(T3.postcode,'.'))) <> T1.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T1.ServiceDataID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        -- flags deleted data
        (CASE
            WHEN T3.case_number IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )
;
-- SELECT * from service_user_dim_new where TicketID is not null and EmailAddress is not null

%%sql
-- SELECT T2.ticket_id,
--     T3.CaseReference,
--     T3.Salutation,
--     T3.FirstName,

--     T3.Postcode,
--     T3.AddressCountry,
--     T3.Organisation,
--     T3.OrganisationType,
--     T3.Role,
--     T3.TelephoneNumber,
--     T3.OtherPhoneNumber,
--     T3.FaxNumber,
--     T3.EmailAddress
-- from service_user_dim_new T3
-- LEFT JOIN zendesk_role T2 ON T3.EmailAddress = T2.email 
-- where ticket_id is not null

SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_application_sub_type_case_name_dim t1 FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.zendesk_custom_fields_id_value t2 ON t1.CaseName=t2.value where CaseName is not null and ticket_id is not null
SELECT * FROM service_user_dim_new t1 LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_all_appeals_dim t2 ON t1.CaseReference = t2.AppealRefNumber
